trans-unit.source: Represents a point at which a workflow or activity can passively wait to be resumed.
trans-unit.target: Representa um ponto em que uma atividade de fluxo de trabalho ou pode ligados passivamente aguardar para ser retomada.

trans-unit.source: When an activity creates a Bookmark, it becomes idle and waits for the Bookmark to be resumed.
trans-unit.target: Quando uma atividade cria um marcador, torna-se inativo e aguarda que o marcador ser retomada.

trans-unit.source: If there are other activities in parallel with the activity that created the Bookmark, they will be scheduled for execution.
trans-unit.target: Se existirem outras atividades em paralelo com a atividade que criou o marcador, será possível agendar para execução.

trans-unit.source: Bookmarks can be resumed by the host application using one of the <xref:System.Activities.WorkflowApplication.ResumeBookmark%2A> overloads.
trans-unit.target: É possível retomar marcadores pela aplicação anfitrião utilizando um do <xref:System.Activities.WorkflowApplication.ResumeBookmark%2A>sobrecargas.</xref:System.Activities.WorkflowApplication.ResumeBookmark%2A>

trans-unit.source: [!INCLUDE[crabout](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] bookmarks, see [Using WorkflowInvoker and WorkflowApplication](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md), [Bookmarks](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md), and the [Bookmarks [ WF Samples]](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md) and [Wait For Input Activity [WF Samples]](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md) samples.
trans-unit.target: [!INCLUDE[crabout](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)]marcadores, consulte [utilizando WorkflowInvoker e WorkflowApplication](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md), [marcadores](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)e o [marcadores [WF amostras]](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md) e [aguardar para o entrada atividade [WF amostras]](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md) amostras.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Activities.Bookmark"></xref> class using the specified name.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa uma nova instância do <xref href="System.Activities.Bookmark"> </xref> classe com o nome especificado.

trans-unit.source: A name that identifies the bookmark.
trans-unit.target: Um nome que identifique o marcador.

trans-unit.source: Determines whether the current <xref href="System.Activities.Bookmark"></xref> and the specified <xref href="System.Activities.Bookmark"></xref> refer to the same continuation point in a workflow.
trans-unit.target: Determina se atual <xref href="System.Activities.Bookmark"> </xref> e especificado <xref href="System.Activities.Bookmark"> </xref> fazer referência ao mesmo ponto de continuação num fluxo de trabalho.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the <xref href="System.Activities.Bookmark"></xref> objects are equal; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Se o <xref href="System.Activities.Bookmark"> </xref> objetos são igual; caso contrário, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Determines whether the current <xref href="System.Activities.Bookmark"></xref> and the specified object refer to the same continuation point in a workflow.
trans-unit.target: Determina se atual <xref href="System.Activities.Bookmark"> </xref> e consulte o objeto especificado para o mesmo ponto de continuação num fluxo de trabalho.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the <xref href="System.Activities.Bookmark"></xref> objects are equal; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Se o <xref href="System.Activities.Bookmark"> </xref> objetos são igual; caso contrário, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Returns a unique identifier for this <xref href="System.Activities.Bookmark"></xref> instance.
trans-unit.target: Devolve um identificador exclusivo para este <xref href="System.Activities.Bookmark"> </xref> instância.

trans-unit.source: The unique identifier of this <xref href="System.Activities.Bookmark"></xref> instance.
trans-unit.target: O identificador exclusivo deste <xref href="System.Activities.Bookmark"> </xref> instância.

trans-unit.source: Returns the bookmark name for a named bookmark or the bookmark ID for an unnamed bookmark.
trans-unit.target: Devolve o nome de marcador para um marcador com o nome ou o ID de marcador para um marcador sem nome.
O nome de marcador ou ID.
